message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This unique item has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. We believe its worth exceeds $1500000 to us, but we are open to discussing a fair price that works for both parties. To start our negotiation, I propose a price of $2000000. Let me know if this is within your consideration range or if you would like to discuss other terms.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. While I appreciate the quality and craftsmanship you've mentioned, I'm looking for a more reasonable price. Given my budget constraints, I propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response.
